theFleshweaver:RitualStaff.NAME: Ritual Staff
theFleshweaver:RitualStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Morphs into a different version depending on your highest stat.

Deal Damage equal to your theFleshweaver:Magical_Rot Rot to all Enemies. Lose all your theFleshweaver:Magical_Rot. NL Gain !theFleshweaver:SecondMagic! theFleshweaver:Magical_Rot.
